title: How to Clean an Old Game Cartridge
category_hierarchy: Video Game Console Maintenance and Repair

steps.headline: Get a small container of alcohol.
steps.description: It is recommended not to dip the swab in the bottle of alcohol, as not to contaminate it.

steps.headline: Dip a cotton swab in the alcohol.
Carefully, but firmly rub the alcohol doused cotton swab against the copper contacts of the game cartridge.
steps.description: Rub about 2 times back and forth, and switch to the other side of the swab. Continue until the swab comes back without dirt on it.

steps.headline: Inspect the cartridges to be sure that there's no cotton fibers left on the cartridge.
Allow the cartridges to dry completely before you attempt to play them.
steps.description: It's best to let them air dry, and not blow on them.

text: Get a small container of alcohol. It is recommended not to dip the swab in the bottle of alcohol, as not to contaminate it. Dip a cotton swab in the alcohol.  Carefully, but firmly rub the alcohol doused cotton swab against the copper contacts of the game cartridge. Rub about 2 times back and forth, and switch to the other side of the swab. Continue until the swab comes back without dirt on it. Inspect the cartridges to be sure that there's no cotton fibers left on the cartridge.  Allow the cartridges to dry completely before you attempt to play them. It's best to let them air dry, and not blow on them.
sentences: Get a small container of alcohol.
It is recommended not to dip the swab in the bottle of alcohol, as not to contaminate it.
Dip a cotton swab in the alcohol.
Carefully, but firmly rub the alcohol doused cotton swab against the copper contacts of the game cartridge.
Rub about 2 times back and forth, and switch to the other side of the swab.
Continue until the swab comes back without dirt on it.
Inspect the cartridges to be sure that there's no cotton fibers left on the cartridge.
Allow the cartridges to dry completely before you attempt to play them.
It's best to let them air dry, and not blow on them.
